# Example Episode Request

## Description

This is an example issue created using the `episode_request.md` template.

## Guest Information

- Guest Name: John Doe
- Guest Bio: John Doe is a software engineer with expertise in web development and open-source projects.
- Guest Contact Information: john.doe@example.com

## Episode Details

- Proposed Topic: Introduction to Web Development
- Proposed Date: 2026-02-15
- Availability: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM EST

## Additional Information

- Brief Description: In this episode, John Doe will discuss the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Any special requirements or notes: Please ensure a stable internet connection for the recording session.
